title: Australians trolling in ranked system?
body:
Hi everyone. I'm a league player and just got into ranked system.
I dont know what really to say with this but hope you guys be awared from these people.
Sorry for my bad English.

replies.body: Top person calls duo bot, 2nd person locks in ADC... its an iffy thing to judge on.

just because your duo, doesn't give you entitlement on monopoly picks.

its a di*k move yes.. but 2nd person has the right to pick what he wants providing it hasnt been picked already PICK ORDER!

Racial slurs are not needed.. 

anyone can be toxic. regardless of nationality.

check yourself


EDIT 
Thanks heartvine :P

> [{quoted}](name=xhausted,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=0q4Eg89H,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-01T00:11:03.470+0000)
>
> Racial shurs not needed.. 
> 
> anyone can be toxic. regardless of **nationality**.
> 
> check yourself

Because there is only one Human race. +1 nonetheless.

can't be as bad as the AD LB on my team. I asked him why he chose that build and he said he was going for more of a bruiser build because we had to much AP. After that game I found out he was on my friends list. Not that I'm judging him as a person lol but it was pretty funny.
What makes you think they're Aussies?
